Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    The class item holds the various variables which describe a single item. It also calls on the class orderLines if an item hold below the MINIMUNORDERNUMBER. This can only happen once per a item as the class also holds a boolean variable alreadyOrdered, which prevents multiple orders.
    Since:
    February 16, 2020
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rifat haque

      • decreaseItemQuantity

        public boolean decreaseItemQuantity()
        This method decreases the quantity if the current quantity of the item is not zero. It also returns true if decreased and false if it cannot be decreased of if the items not within the list.
        Returns:
        true if quantity is decreased and false if it is not decreased

      • generateOrderLine

        public OrderLines generateOrderLine()
        Creates the order for an item if the item is below the minimum stock quantity. This method does not allow for multiple orders as it checks if the item has already had an order placed under its name.
        Returns:
        the order or null if an order is not made

      • printItem

        public void printItem()
        Prints the individual Item and all its information. This includes its id, name,quantity,price,and matching supplierId.
